column5: News;(Sihanoukville): Garlic goods imported from China containing chemical pesticide ------Disulfoton------ was destroyed by the Camcontrol General Department of the Ministry of Commerce on the morning of  Thursday
column7: 2019 to protect welfare of the people.------The Minister praised the provincial branch of Camcontrol
column8: which had seized all the harmful garlic and destroyed it in time
column9: because it could affect the nervous system and causevomiting
column11: breathing problems and can be fatal in severe cases. ------TVFB
